cheng2020skeleton.paper_names: Skeleton-Based Action Recognition With Shift Graph Convolutional Network
cheng2020skeleton.authors: Cheng, Ke and Zhang, Yifan and He, Xiangyu and Chen, Weihan and Cheng, Jian and Lu, Hanqing
cheng2020skeleton.publisher: Proceedings of the IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
cheng2020skeleton.brief: 该文章启发自Shift卷积算子，是该算子在Graph领域的延生，用更少的参数量和计算量实现了更好的性能，此外该网络不需要任何空间卷积，通过shift操作就可以实现空间感受野。
